thread.title: Journalists’ sources under threat with data retention regime (IFJ - International Federation of Journalists)
thread.title_full: Journalists’ sources under threat with data retention regime (IFJ - International Federation of Journalists) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Journalists’ sources under threat with data retention regime (IFJ - International Federation of Journalists)
text: ( Source : IFJ - International Federation of Journalists ) The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) joins its affiliate the Media, Entertainment & Arts Alliance ( MEAA ) in condemning the commencement of new data retention laws
